message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I can meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $160 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $160, but I'm willing to be flexible. How about we meet in the middle at $155?
I'm still trying to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $145?
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $165 for the product. Can you meet me at $152?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $142?
